title: GCE O-Level Chemistry: Introduction to Organic Chemistry
snippet: Covers the fundamental concepts of organic chemistry, including naming conventions, general formulas, and key functional groups for the GCE O-Level syllabus.

title: GCE O-Level Physics: Mechanics, Forces, and Motion
snippet: Detailed notes on linear motion, vectors, Newton's three laws of motion, and calculation of forces for the O-Level examination.

title: GCE O-Level Physics: Radioactivity and Basic Electronics
snippet: The structure of the atom, properties of radioactive emissions, the concept of half-life, and basic principles of the Cathode Ray Oscilloscope (C.R.O).

title: Web Development Basics for ELABE Portal
snippet: Introduction to HTML structure, CSS styling, and recommendations for powerful code editors to build your own academic portal.
